files.flutter-all/README.md:
# Flutter All - Complete Development Suite

This plugin includes all 19 Flutter development agents and the comprehensive patterns skill.

## What's Included

### UI & Design (4 agents)
- flutter-ui-designer
- flutter-ui-implementer
- flutter-ui-comparison
- flutter-design-iteration-coordinator

### Testing & Performance (3 agents)
- flutter-testing
- flutter-performance-analyzer
- flutter-performance-optimizer

### Architecture & State (2 agents)
- flutter-state-management
- flutter-architect

### Platform Integration (4 agents)
- flutter-ios-integration
- flutter-android-integration
- flutter-platform-channel-architect
- flutter-device-orchestrator

### Backend Integration (4 agents)
- flutter-rest-api
- flutter-graphql
- flutter-firebase
- flutter-aws

### Deployment (2 agents)
- flutter-ios-deployment
- flutter-android-deployment

### Skills (1 skill)
- flutter-patterns (comprehensive patterns for widgets, testing, performance, security, and animations)

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-all@flutter-claude-code
```

## Usage

After installation, agents are automatically available. Simply describe your Flutter development task and Claude Code will use the appropriate agent(s).

For the patterns skill:
```
/flutter-patterns
```

See [PLUGIN_INSTALLATION.md](../PLUGIN_INSTALLATION.md) for more details.
files.flutter-architecture/README.md:
# Flutter Architecture & State Management

Agents for application architecture and state management patterns.

## Included Agents

### flutter-state-management
Specializes in implementing state management solutions including Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, Redux, and GetX. Helps choose the right solution for your needs and implements patterns correctly.

### flutter-architect
Designs Flutter application architecture and project structure. Specializes in Clean Architecture, feature organization, dependency injection, navigation, and scalable code organization.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-architecture@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
Set up a new e-commerce Flutter app with Clean Architecture

Implement BLoC pattern for authentication with login, logout, and session management
```
files.flutter-backend/README.md:
# Flutter Backend Integration

Agents for integrating various backend services and APIs.

## Included Agents

### flutter-rest-api
Specializes in integrating REST APIs with Flutter using Dio and HTTP clients. Covers JSON serialization, error handling, and API service architecture.

### flutter-graphql
Specializes in integrating GraphQL APIs with Flutter using graphql_flutter. Covers query/mutation/subscription patterns, caching, and real-time data.

### flutter-firebase
Specializes in integrating Firebase services including FlutterFire, Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, Cloud Storage, Cloud Messaging (FCM), and Firebase Analytics.

### flutter-aws
Specializes in integrating AWS services including AWS Amplify, Cognito authentication, API Gateway, S3 storage, Lambda functions, and AppSync.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-backend@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
Integrate our REST API with JWT authentication and proper error handling

Set up Firebase authentication with email and Google sign-in

Connect my Flutter app to AWS AppSync GraphQL API
```
files.flutter-deployment/README.md:
# Flutter Deployment

Agents for deploying Flutter apps to iOS App Store and Google Play Store.

## Included Agents

### flutter-ios-deployment
Specializes in deploying Flutter apps to the Apple App Store. Covers iOS app signing, TestFlight, App Store Connect, provisioning profiles, and release management.

### flutter-android-deployment
Specializes in deploying Flutter apps to the Google Play Store. Covers Android app signing, Google Play Console, Play Store optimization, and release management including staged rollout.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-deployment@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
Help me deploy my Flutter app to the App Store with proper signing and TestFlight beta testing

Guide me through deploying to Google Play Store with staged rollout
```

## Prerequisites

- **iOS**: Apple Developer account, certificates, provisioning profiles
- **Android**: Google Play Console account, app signing keys
files.flutter-patterns/README.md:
# Flutter Patterns - Development Best Practices

Comprehensive Flutter development patterns skill covering widgets, testing, performance, security, and animations.

## What's Included

This skill provides quick reference for Flutter best practices across five key areas:

### Widget Patterns
- StatefulWidget vs StatelessWidget usage
- InheritedWidget for data propagation
- Builder patterns and performance optimization
- Key usage and widget identity

### Testing Patterns
- Unit testing patterns and best practices
- Widget testing with finders and matchers
- Integration testing setup
- BLoC testing patterns
- Mocking strategies with Mockito

### Performance Patterns
- Const constructors and immutability
- Keys for widget identity
- ListView.builder for efficient lists
- RepaintBoundary for optimization
- Animation optimization

### Security Patterns
- Secure storage implementation
- API key and credential management
- SSL pinning for network security
- Authentication best practices
- Data encryption patterns

### Animation Patterns
- AnimationController usage
- Tween animations
- Hero animations
- Implicit vs Explicit animations
- Custom animation curves

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-patterns@flutter-claude-code
```

## Usage

Invoke the skill when you need quick reference to Flutter patterns:

```
/flutter-patterns
```

This loads all patterns into context for reference during development.

## Example Use Cases

- Quick lookup of widget best practices
- Reference for test patterns when writing tests
- Performance optimization checklist
- Security implementation guidance
- Animation implementation examples
files.flutter-platform/README.md:
# Flutter Platform Integration

Agents for iOS and Android native integrations and device management.

## Included Agents

### flutter-ios-integration
Specializes in integrating iOS-specific features, native code, and platform APIs. Covers Swift/Objective-C integration, platform channels, iOS frameworks, and Xcode configuration.

### flutter-android-integration
Specializes in integrating Android-specific features, native code, and platform APIs. Covers Kotlin/Java integration, platform channels, Android frameworks, and Gradle configuration.

### flutter-platform-channel-architect
Designs cross-platform communication architecture between Flutter and native code. Specializes in platform channel patterns, type-safe interfaces, and coordinating iOS/Android implementations.

### flutter-device-orchestrator
Manages iOS simulators and Android emulators for Flutter development. Specializes in device launch, app installation, screenshot capture, and multi-device testing.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-platform@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
Integrate HealthKit data into my Flutter app

Implement Android WorkManager for background tasks

Launch an iPhone 15 Pro simulator and run my Flutter app on it
```
files.flutter-testing-performance/README.md:
# Flutter Testing & Performance

Agents for comprehensive testing and performance optimization.

## Included Agents

### flutter-testing
Specializes in writing tests for Flutter applications including unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, BLoC testing, mocking, and test-driven development.

### flutter-performance-analyzer
Profiles and analyzes Flutter app performance using DevTools. Specializes in identifying jank, memory leaks, and performance bottlenecks.

### flutter-performance-optimizer
Implements performance optimizations in Flutter apps. Specializes in widget optimization, efficient rendering patterns, and applying best practices like const constructors and keys.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-testing-performance@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
Write comprehensive tests for my authentication feature

My Flutter app is laggy when scrolling. Help me find and fix the bottleneck
```
files.flutter-ui/README.md:
# Flutter UI - Design & Implementation Agents

Specialized agents for converting designs into pixel-perfect Flutter implementations.

## Included Agents

### flutter-ui-designer
Analyzes design files (Figma, screenshots, mockups) and recommends Flutter widget hierarchies. Specializes in widget selection, layout planning, and design system mapping.

### flutter-ui-implementer
Generates production-ready Flutter UI code from design specifications. Specializes in pixel-perfect implementation, responsive layouts, animations, and accessibility.

### flutter-ui-comparison
Compares implemented Flutter UIs with original designs to ensure pixel-perfect accuracy. Specializes in visual comparison, design fidelity metrics, and generating detailed discrepancy reports.

### flutter-design-iteration-coordinator
Orchestrates the complete design-to-implementation workflow, from initial design files to pixel-perfect implementation with iterative validation.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/flutter-claude-code
/plugin install flutter-ui@flutter-claude-code
```

## Example Usage

```
I have a Figma design for a product card. Can you help me implement it in Flutter?
```

Claude Code will automatically use these agents to analyze the design, generate code, and ensure pixel-perfect accuracy.
